# www.robotstxt.org/

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow files and directories
Disallow: /404.html
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /.github/
Disallow: /.jekyll-cache/
Disallow: /_plugins/
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /_data/

# Allow scripts and media files
Allow: /assets/css/
Allow: /assets/js/
Allow: /assets/images/

# Sitemap
Sitemap: http://0.0.0.0:5000/sitemap.xml
